txt.en: We have nearly exhausted our supply of Gondorian prisoners, but I have heard tell that a great force of men approaches from the south-west. Capture any that draw too close and make ready to deliver them to Faltor-shik. After you have claimed those men, return to Mordor and gather any weak or elderly Nurnhoth you can find. Promise them freedom from their shackles, but instead deliver them to me upon the hill of sacrifice.\n\nThe Bloodletter
